column2: Generic popover implementation for iOS with same API as the UIPopoverController for the iPad, but configurable with custom background and available for iPhone as well.

column5: message
Added method to check whether popover can be successfully presented from a specified view
Fixed empty param tag
Fixed hang after invalid view hierarchy exception occurred
Modified behaviour when popover is transitioning for presentation.
Ensured dismiss is possible when a popover is being presented and the other way around: both wait until the other operation is complete before starting the new transition.
Updated podspec version
Fixed bug in determining the correct arrow direction based on display surface
Updated pod spec

Bug fixes in view repositioning upon rotation. Also the delegate method willRepositionPopoverToRect is now called even on first positioning to allow delegates to override the position of the popover. Propeties containerView and backgroundView are now exposed read-only in the interface
Fixed deprecation warning
Updated podspec
Fixed bug where effectivePopoverContentSize would not be recalculated upon orientation change
Fixed deprecation warning for old method
Updated pod spec
Added preferredContentSize method for delegates to implement sizing based on constraints posed by the display area for the popover
Updated pod spec
Fixed bug related to popover not being properly removed from parent viewcontroller
Updated podsped
Bug fix
Updated pod spec
Fixed bug related to adding child view controller to parent view controller if set
Updated podspec
Added parentViewController property to support explicit parent view controller relationships
Updated podspec
Added support for getting the list of active popovers and specifying whether gestures outside the popover should be blocked or not
Updated podspec
Modified test code
Bugfixes related to new shadow feature
Update pod spec
Added support for shadow around popover background
Updated pod spec
Fixed bug related to invalid view hierarchy exception
Updated podspec
Fixed bug in WEPopoverContainerView
Updated WEPopover podspec
Fixed bug with reposition of container view
Updated WEPopover podspec
Fixed bug where backgroundViewForPopoverController delegate method was not obeyed
Updated pod spec
Added transitionBlock and afterDismissBlock to WEPopoverController API
Added properties isDismissing and isPresenting
Fixed bug with concurrent presentationg/dismissal/reposition
Added show/dismiss notification and fixed bug in blocking gesture recognizer. Also improved animation when setting new contentViewController
Bugfixes related to animation
Fix for animation
Fixed warning and added pod spec
Lowered margin for arrow animation
Fixed bug with animation duration during dismiss
Cleaned up API and added documentation
Bugfixes and changes to containerview properties
Fixed repositioning bug with new content controller
Fixed bug with blocking gesture recognizer
Fixed background color of WETouchableView
Fixed bug with background fill
Made background area configurable
Fixed popover arrow
Fixed displayarea for status bar
Added support for animating changes to content controller using reposition method
Added show/present/reposition methods with completion block parameter
Added delegate method for specifying the display area for the popover
Added configurable animation duration and animation type
Updated animation curve to easeIn/easeOut
Added mask bordercolor and borderwidth
Fixed crash when a non zero mask was supplied with a small content size
Fixed bug in popover positioning when the requested size extends beyond the bounds of the display area
Fixed bug in blocking gesture recognizer
Added support for blocking gestures of parent gesture recognizers
Added rotation support and support for delegate method - (void)popoverController:(WEPopoverController *)popoverController willRepositionPopoverToRect:(inout CGRect *)rect inView:(inout UIView **)view
Fixed containerview frame calculations
Minor fix
Fixed bug where arrow image did not occur anymore due to refactoring for ARC
Added popoverLayoutMargins property to WEPopoverController
Migrated to ARC
Fixed linker error and refined keyView method
Added mask corner radius and insets to WEPopoverContainerViewProperties
Fixed bug with popoverContentSize in WEPopoverController
Fixed animated repositioning bug for popover
Added exception when popover is presented from incorrect view
Modified WEContainerViewProperties with images instead of image names
Fixed bug in fading out of background view
Added backgroundView and backgroundColor properties
Added iOS 7 images, fixed rounding bugs and made delegate methods optional
Added iOS 7 images, fixed rounding bugs and made delegate methods optional
Bug fixes in placement of popover and iOS 6 compatibility.
Added Paul Solt's images
Fixed issues #10 and #11 thanks to chrispix and ntamas
Modified README
Fixed bug with positioning when popover display area lies outside the view which was supplied to the presentPopover method
Removed supported popover directions left and right for bar button item
Fixed positioning issues of popover
Fixed support for interface rotation
Fixed bug in passthroughViews functionality in TouchableView: touches are now always delivered to subviews of the TouchableView
Added missing files (forgot to check them in)
Fixed arrow positioning bug near edges. Added arrowMargin to WEContainerViewProperties class to specify a minimum margin near the edges for the arrow.
Fixed bug in placement of arrow
